recordings.requestBody: {"documents":[{"id":"1","text":"I had a wonderful trip to Seattle last week and even visited the Space Needle 2 times!","language":"en"},{"id":"2","text":"Unfortunately, it rained during my entire trip to Seattle. I didn't even get to visit the Space Needle","language":"en"},{"id":"3","text":"I went to see a movie on Saturday and it was perfectly average, nothing more or less than I expected.","language":"en"},{"id":"4","text":"Los caminos que llevan hasta Monte Rainier son espectaculares y hermosos.","language":"es"},{"id":"5","text":"La carretera estaba atascada. Había mucho tráfico el día de ayer.","language":"es"}]}
